item.title: [ 50] /ptg/ - Private Trackers General
item.description:
see-through Edition

>Not sure what private trackers are all about?
A private tracker is a torrent website that provides the same functionality as a public tracker but is invite-only. Each member share common goals: collecting, preserving and discussing media.

>Have a question?
- FAQ https://archive.is/UVQkn
- WIKI https://igwiki.lyci.de/wiki/Private_trackers
- STUDY https://www.cambridge.org/core/services/aop-cambridge-core/content/view/2F379FE0CB50DF502F0075119FD3E060
- SPREADSHEET https://hdvinnie.github.io/Private-Trackers-Spreadsheet/
- TEN CURRY COMMANDMENTS https://pastebin.com/raw/dBbdE73M
- TEN NEON COMMANDMENTS https://pastebin.com/raw/Ud2pGYaE
- IRC irc://irc.sageru.org#ptg

Use >>>/g/ptg as a link to find the /ptg/ thread.

>Remember the following:
>READ THE OP BEFORE MAKING A FUCKING QUESTION YOU RETARDED FAGGOT
>It doesn't matter if you use the same username in different trackers, the staff still share your IP with each other.
>Staff is reading, being /marked/ is NOT a meme, and even if it is, it isn't.
>Don't ask for invites, it's private for a reason.
>If starting out you should interview for RED, rank to TM, wait on account age and get invites from there. THAT'S IT THAT IS ALL YOU HAVE TO DO
>Bonus points are for hoarding, not for spending.
>When the website dies, you will be able to migrate your bp and buffer to animeZ
>the easiest way into trackers is a time machine

>【NEWS】
>>105185000 >>105185144 public and private tracker gets
>>105185187 RED deniers in shambles
>>105186533 when we will stop?
>>105187647 post more screens!
>>105191735 anon gets publicly shamed
>>105200519 anon is marked for life


Previous thread: >>105183819
item.author: Anonymous

item.title: [ 37] Now that the bullrun is back on and we're all going to make it
item.description:
Where are you going to retire early? For me, it's the Philippines. I already spent 1 1/2 year in the Philippines from age 28-29.

In that 1.5 years I slept with at least 100 different normal women, and fucked all of them without a condom and came inside of them. Bedroom talk consisted mostly of telling them I was going to get them pregnant, and them agreeing it was a fantastic idea and being completely on board with becoming a mother ASAP.

Sometimes they complained they were too young, but I told them I didn't care and was going to cum inside of them, and they coped by asking me if I would take care of the baby, to which I always said yes. From that point onward they were also totally into it.

On a few occasions the young women seemed surprised that I blew my load directly into their pussies, "Why did you cum inside me?!", to which I would simply answer "Because I am trying to get you pregnant." It was like a bolt of electricity shooting through their empty skulls. They just nodded and accepted that was what they were for. There may have been the occasional pout, but not once in my time there did I have a woman become legitimately upset or demand I use a condom, or pay for morning after pills, etc.

Then there was also the street girl that did anal who became a regular for me. It got to the point where I was buttfucking her almost every day for pocket change. After fucking I'd toss her an extra 500 pesos as long as she kept my cum in her ass and didn't fart it out into the toilet. She would text me after telling me she can still feel my cum and how it was making her horny again.

Original filename: 57893041235.webm
item.author: Anonymous

item.title: [435] /nrl/ - Rugby League General - Friday Night Footy - round 10
item.description:
Still friends edition

NRL
>GAME 1
Newcastle Knights v Gold Coast Titans
6:00pm AEST on Fox and Kayo
McDonald Jones Stadium, Newcastle
1.46-2.74
>The Knights returned to the winner's list with an impressive win at Magic Round, while the Titans will be boosted by the return of Jayden Campbell. Newcastle ended a five-match losing streak with a dominant Magic Round 30-4 demolition of the Rabbitohs, breaking a losing run that started with a 26-6 defeat to the Titans in round 3. Gold Coast have now lost five straight, including a 20 point loss to the Bulldogs last weekend, and sit 16th on the ladder. The Titans defeated the Knights 26-6 earlier this season, but have not beaten them in Newcastle in their last six attempts, with their last win over the Knights at this venue being back in 2016.
Knights 1-12 2.85
Knights 13+ 2.60
Titans 1-12 3.75
Titans 13+ 7.00
Knights -6.5 1.96 Titans +5.5 1.85

>GAME 2
South Sydney Rabbitohs v Brisbane Broncos
8:05pm AEST on Fox, Kayo and Ch9
Accor Stadium, Sydney
3.82-1.27
>A nice coaching twist to this game. Wayne Bennett guided the Broncos to six titles & Michael Maguire was successful in 2014 with the Rabbitohs. South Sydney’s woes continued with a 30-4 defeat to Newcastle, their fourth in a row and keeping them anchored near the bottom of the table. Brisbane followed up a commanding win over ladder-leaders Canterbury with a deflating 32-8 loss to the Panthers. Ezra Mam’s nine-week suspension is over, but he returns via Queensland Cup. The Rabbitohs have been dominant in recent H2H meetings at Accor Stadium, winning four out of five, with the Broncos victorious on only two occasions.
Rabbitohs 1-12 4.80
Rabbitohs 13+ 10.50
Broncos 1-12 2.90
Broncos 13+ 2.02
Rabbitohs +10.5 1.88 Broncos -10.5 1.92

Original filename: Friends.jpg
item.author: Anonymous

item.title: [ 49] Installing Linux was the worst decision of my life
item.description:
>Windows-chan
>You want to install an application? Sure thing, just click on the .exe file!

>Linux retardo-kun
>You want to do WHAT?! Uh alright, we can do that I think. Open the terminal, open a YouTube tutorial while you're at it because you will need to know a lot of code for this...
>1 hour later
>No, not that command! You need... ugh... you will need that command later, okay? Right now you need to type a different command into the terminal...
>...can you watch another tutorial please?

Seriously what the fuck is this? I still can't figure out how to install this goddamned .sh file.

Original filename: windows_7_os_tan_nana_by_kenoten.jpg
item.author: Anonymous

item.title: [ 54] US-UK Trade Deal
item.description:
UK and US announce trade deal to save thousands of British jobs, Starmer says

https://news.sky.com/story/uk-and-us-agree-trade-deal-as-starmer-and-trump-make-announcement-in-live-phone-call-13363710

The UK and US have agreed a trade deal, with Sir Keir Starmer and Donald Trump confirming the announcement during a live televised phone call.

It is the first trade deal agreed after Mr Trump began his second presidential term in January, and after he imposed strict tariffs on countries around the world in April.

Sir Keir said the "first-of-a-kind" deal with the US will save thousands of jobs across the UK, boost British business and protect British industry.

Original filename: starmer_trump.jpg

item.description:

item.title: [ 74] /cfb/ - Not so fast! edition
item.description:
>Michigan Coach Suspension
Sherrone Moore faces a reported two-game suspension due to the Connor Stalions scandal, missing games against Central Michigan and Nebraska but allowed to coach against Oklahoma.

>Lee Corso’s Retirement
Longtime ESPN College GameDay analyst Lee Corso will retire after Week 1 of the 2025 season, marking the end of an era.

>NCAA Governance Changes Proposed
NCAA President Charlie Baker announced plans for a new governance structure to be released in July, granting individual sports more control over their rules and policies. This aims to give Power 4 conferences greater influence.

>House v. NCAA Settlement Update
A new brief in the House v. NCAA case includes provisions to grandfather in athletes affected by roster cuts for the 2025-26 season, allowing reinstatement at schools' discretion.

>Nico Iamaleava Transfer Drama
Former Tennessee QB Nico Iamaleava’s transfer to UCLA continues to make waves, with Arkansas’ NIL collective seeking a $200K buyout from him and another player.

>Clemson’s Unique Addition
Ian Schieffelin, a basketball player, accepted coach Dabo Swinney’s offer to join Clemson’s football team, forgoing pro basketball for now.

>Transfer Portal Highlights
The spring transfer window closed, but top uncommitted prospects remain, with teams like UNLV and Tulane boosting rosters for playoff hopes.

>Recruiting News
The Class of 2026 five-star recruits are shaping up, with May expected to bring significant commitments.

Original filename: Sherrone Moore.png

item.title: [ 77] Why do you guys want to "make it"?
item.description:
Why would you want to stop working for the rest of your life?
If you want to make it to "do nothing", what's next after you get your financial security? Sitting around doom scrolling green reddit and drinking?
Whats the point of making it when your plan is to do nothing until you die?
Making money as a wagie might be your only purpose in life.

item.title: [137] /vp/ plays Pokemon Wack
item.description:
LAST TIME:
>I continue playing Wack, pwn some criminals trying to steal a legendary that got randomized into some random shitmon, pwn an entire Juvite base, and go investigate what's going on in the Cherno City Power Plant
>Turns out Team Wack is trying to steal the nuclear waste legendary inside (which got randomized into a trubbish kek)
>After one of their admins accidentally pisses it off, I have to hide from the blast inside a conveniently nearby fridge
>I then fight the seventh gym leader, Hiroshima, who has two cocoonmons because lol randomizer
>Then I get struck with some annoying disease called Procrastination, I hope someone finds a cure
>Meanwhile YancyChan sits through a virtualization reskin, made by the same vantablack brimstone ID demon pretending to be a "developer" that also made Virtualization
>With mapping that genuinely makes Wack maps look better, from an aesthetic and definitely gameplay standpoint (there is no fucking legitimate purpose to have map sizes in excess of 250x250)
>Also some madman attempts to play some r*juvlike, but I've only seen one post from him since he said he'd play it so I'm giving it until next thread to see if he's actually gone insane or not
>4 days later I finally remember to play Wack like I should be doing, and make my way into Juvite-occupied Cyberspace to stop them from catching some legendaries

>What is this?
This is a thread where a bunch of autists come together and play usually shitty fangames and occasionally an actually decent one. Join this black hole of a general if you want.

>How do I join?
Just make a name and/or tripcode and start posting images of whatever fangame/romhack you're playing and try not to be annoying.

>"nu"-Archive (repurposed old rentry award)
https://rentry.org/vp-plays

Original filename: 2025-05-07 (29).png

item.title: [116] Millennial cuisine has been defined by shallow gimmicks, a very faux sentimenta
item.description:
Millennial cuisine has been defined by shallow gimmicks, a very faux sentimentality, and trying to reinvent the wheel (look to the burger/pizza restaurants they open) . Seemingly all of these things have led to a toxic culture of shallow presentation and verbose moralizing. Nothing good or great has come out of it other then the circus freaks who call themselves chiefs.
What will Zoomer cosine look like? I don't reckon it will be as gaudy or preachy as the Millennial but I am in no high hopes of any sort of major change. Ideally there will be a pre-1970 French cuisine revival but I won't hold my breath.

Original filename: gross.jpg

item.title: [109] Fangame of Dubious Quality Submission Thread
item.description:
Developing a Pokémon fangame built almost entirely from submissions, replacing the original types, Pokémon, abilities, and moves.
Finally free from the irl obligation I mentioned last thread, and go most thing implemented as well

Main Doc: https://scrawny-crustacean-f0d.notion.site/Fangame-of-Dubious-Quality-1b5b9ecf5b6e80d5889dda00b4bf40e7

Typechart: https://files.catbox.moe/fxd84y.png


Currently open for submissions for:
- Type chart effectiveness changes
- Moves
- Abilities
- Items
- Sprites/Backsprites (See docs)
- Menu Sprites (128x64)
- Pokémon
- Important Earlygame Trainers

If you're interested in contributing but don't have any original ideas, you can also fill in requests, listed here:
https://scrawny-crustacean-f0d.notion.site/1c9b9ecf5b6e8089894ae49d5ef6dc23?v=1c9b9ecf5b6e8077b452000cede46188

Most of the submission options don't have a template since they're rather simple so don't need one, only Pokémon submissions:

>Name*:
>Type(s)*:
>Stats*:
>Gender Ratio:
>(Level Up) Move(s)*:
>Abilitiy/ies*:
>Growth Rate*:
>BaseXP:
>EVs:
>Catch Rate:
>Base Happiness:
>Height:
>Weight:
>Egg Group(s):
>Hatch Steps:
>Category+Pokedex*:
>Front Sprite*:
>Backsprite:
>Shiny:
>Wild held Item(s):
>Cry:
>Evolves To/Method:
>Evolves from:
*Required
Send links to sprites

Sprite Templates:
>Party Sprite: https://files.catbox.moe/31ex2n.png
>Item Sprite (Size): https://files.catbox.moe/nt7cap.png
>Ball Throw Sprite: https://files.catbox.moe/zi8eyc.png

item.title: [ 62] /SWF/ - Semper ViVet Flash
item.description:
Flash will live /f/orevar

Flash hacking, restoration, archival and resurrection general

ITT: We continue our attempts to convince the admin team to bring back /f/ from >>105082557

The current canonical idea I'm working on to that end is to build a new backend and verification library for /f/, to tackle the perceived reasons for bringing down /f/ listed in 4chan's blog:
https://blog.4chan.org/post/781845918774394880/still-standing

However admins are difficult to get in touch with on irc on the issue, so any ideas would be appreciated.

Status report: libswftag+swfcheck are now barely usable for uncompressed swfs. Progress from my end will be slower this week until friday but outside of the check_functions, the few remaining changes/improvements to the library will be made.

github.com/flash-computer/libswftag
github.com/flash-computer/swfcheck

There are still no php-anons to help build the backend however.

General stuff:

Tools:
>players
ruffle.rs/downloads
archive.org/details/flashplayer32_0r0_363_win_sa

item.title: [ 54] Cake and dessert thread
item.description:
Thread for desserts you've made, discussion and questions. Feel free to post and rate.

Starting with a cake I made and am currently eating.

Base is biscuits with cinnamon. There is a thin layer of cherry jam on on top of the base.
The main body is mascarpone mousse, with strawberry and quark.
Top layer is vanilla and white chocolate. The red pattern is the same stuff, with a bit of coloring.
On top I have some strawberries and basil. The strawberries were not really good. They are imported at this time of year where I live, so they are mainly for show, not for flavor.
Basil is my home grown and really goes well with strawberry.

Hey voyagers,

The sticky probably needs to be updated, I'll keep the thread open for suggestions:

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

/trv/ is a slow board, so don't expect immediate responses. CHECK THE CATALOG – you might find threads already discussing topics you're interested in.

Before asking for suggestions, tell /trv/ about your:
>Budget
>Interests
>Level of understanding of the local language(s)
This makes it easier to give quality advice. Of course, keep your posts travel related.

For all other matters:
General culture questions >>>/int/
Politics discussion >>>/pol/
Transportation discussion >>>/n/
Outdoors-related discussion >>>/out/

For more information about safety, planning and other miscellaneous topics, check out the pastebin:

item.title: [289] /XMR/ Monero General
item.description:
Welcome to the /XMR/ Monero General, dedicated to the discussion of the world's most widely adopted privacy coin.

Monero payments are anonymous, low-fee by design and fully fungible, meaning users can send XMR globally without issue and receive XMR without having to worry about tainted coins. Battle-tested privacy tech (Ring Signatures, Stealth Addresses and RingCT) ensures that critical TX data cannot be gleaned from the Monero blockchain. Thus by default, the TX history of all Monero users is kept hidden from the prying eyes of adversaries, with TXs being optionally transparent via the aid of a view key.

Monero algorithmically ensures low TX fees by employing a dynamic (elastic) block size that can "stretch" to easily accommodate sudden TX spikes.

Monero's bespoke mining algorithm, RandomX, is optimized for devices using general-purpose CPUs e.g. desktops, laptops, smartphones, tablets, keeping the barrier to entry low and ASICs out of the equation.

Monero's tail emission - 0.6 XMR every block forever - financially incentives for-profit miners to keep mining, helping boost long-term network security. This constant linear inflation asymptotically trends to zero and is offset somewhat by a steady rate of coin loss.

Monero has thus far proven to be the only altcoin capable of overcoming BTC's network effect by driving it out of the darknet economy BTC dominated for over 10 years. Monero is now also starting to overtake BTC in clearnet commerce as well. See below.

If you still have questions, feel free to ask and a MoneroChad will be with you shortly.


XMR Redpill: https://yewtu.be/watch?v=wq6w03E2DS4

XMR Resources: https://libereco.xyz/resources/

XMR Stats: moneroj.net

USE XMR: https://cryptwerk.com/pay-with/xmr/

OFFICIAL WEBSITE - getmonero.org

WHERE TO BUY XMR: https://i.imgur.com/XdppsQ7.png
